title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Competencies: GIS-Based Spatial Data Analysis Practical Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can design spatial data collection-analysis-visualization processes utilizing fundamental GIS concepts
Learners can complete two practical case-solving tasks per week using learning objects accessible in mobile environments.
Learners can demonstrate final outcomes through blended offline/online assessment tools (e.g., practical reports, spatial analysis projects) at the end of the course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
